column4: I have removed nv/nvidia proprietory drivers, and installed nouveau. my login and desktop are good in recovery/failsafe mode, but not in normal mode.
am using 10.10 on a old geforce 6100 card.
I have removed nv/nvidia proprietory drivers, and installed nouveau. my login and desktop are good in recovery/failsafe mode, but not in normal mode. geforce 6100 ubuntu 10.10
install nvidia-current   you may need to run:  sudo nvidia-xconfig   too
